blocks.content_html:
Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Plugins > ActorModifierCore > Subsystems

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • UEngineSubsystem
  • UActorModifierCoreSubsystem

References

   
Module ActorModifierCore
Header /Engine/Plugins/Experimental/ActorModifierCore/Source/ActorModifierCore/Public/Subsystems/ActorModifierCoreSubsystem.h
Include #include "Subsystems/ActorModifierCoreSubsystem.h"

Syntax

UCLASS ()  
class UActorModifierCoreSubsystem : public UEngineSubsystem

Remarks

This subsystem handle all modifiers stack active in the engine and allows to create modifiers with registered metadata

Variables

  Type Name Description
bool bFilesLoaded Asset Registry files loaded
TMap< TWeakObjectPtr< const ULevel >, TWeakObjectPtr< AActorModifierCoreSharedActor > > ModifierSharedProviders Stores modifiers providers per world/level, there should be only one provider per level
TMap< FName, TSharedRef< FActorModifierCoreMetadata > > ModifiersMetadata Stores modifiers metadata, you can override these if you want a different behaviour
TMap< TWeakObjectPtr< const AActor >, TWeakObjectPtr< UActorModifierCoreStack > > ModifierStacks Stores modifiers stacks per actor, there should be only one root stack per actor
